name: Unstoppable
description:
Unstoppable is an adrenaline-pumping horror adventure. Few will survive or uncover the twisted truth!

Escape Everway Investment, where a mysterious gas has turned office workers insane. Every decision counts as you explore dark corridors, hunt down clues, and fight the psychotic hordes. Will you get to the bottom of the infection or die in the shadows?



Realistic Combat
Challenging, physics-based combat. Feel the true weight of each blow.



Stealth and Heightened Senses
Open your eyes and ears. The infected rely on ambushes.



Episodic Mystery
What caused this madness? Unravel the global conspiracy with each new chapter.



Survival Mode
Test your prowess against endless hordes of the infected.



Critical Choices
Inventory choices mean the difference between life and death – and hard blows may break your weapons ...

Will McKnight manage to escape? Dive into the adventure, if you dare …
